OOC Dose poisonous exhaust in the corridors mean anything to you guys? And 
what the hell is the bridg? Do you mean bridge? Or Brig? 

    Megatron watched as the internal shields switched on in several of the 
corridors, mostly the ones that gave access to the Engin room. As for the 
Autoguns, scince there were only 10 (according to Kinger) they could be taken 
out easily.
    The engin rooms doors opened, Megatron, followed by Waspinator and 
Rampage exited and closed the doors behinde them, listening to is lock tight. 
Holding a small communicator, Megatron had a link to Tarantulas who dictated 
the internal shield locations.
    "Lets go. I want this to be quick, and clean. The less repair we have to 
do after this the better." Megatron said, his tail cannon glowing with the 
plasma it was ready to fire. 
    Walking down the corridor they spotted what used to be an autogun. 
Apparently it was shot, not to long ago seeing as how it was still smoking. 
The footsteps of the bots were loud, only because the ship was so quiet. The 
bridge, being 8 levels above them and far to the north, it was rather hard to 
hear any comotion from the Rebels.
    "Tarantulas, I want corridor 7F sealed behinde me, do you have that?" 
Megatron said, still walking as Waspinator looked up into a nearby security 
camera and blasted it to the ground. Promptly he slammed his boot apon it, 
making sure it was deactivated. 
    A rhaspy voice came back mixed with static, the Rebels were trying to 
scramble their communications without success, "Yes Megatron, I've got it. 
The scaners show a clear path ahead of you. But, a few levels up several bots 
are moving out." He warned.
    Megatron shook his head, "Dont worry, Im sure we will bump into them. "He 
said finally and ended the transmission. Placing the communication on his 
waist he griped his arm cannon and the three continued onward as a sudden hum 
and flash of light took residence behide them, indicating that the shield had 
been raised.

    Black Aracnia and Gremlin had reached the top level of the ship, 
containing the bridge and Quickstrike. The most heavily gaurded spot of the 
ship, it was also the one filled with the most enemies. Getting in and out 
without being detected was going to be impossible so they would have to make 
it quick.
    Gremlin opened the lift doors agian and they stepped out into the western 
most corridor. This section contained the high ranking officers sleeping 
suites. Large rooms with fancy furniture. Nothing of much use to them as of 
right now. Aracnia proceeded north, the direction of the bridge.
    "So, Aracnia, how do you plan on getting inside the bridge? Just waltzing 
inside?" Gremlin asked the arachnid as she scurried along in her beast mode. 
" I dont get it."
    She stopped and grabbed him. Her eyes, all eight of them, were intense. 
He could see the strain she was under. But also, he could see the ironic 
humor of it, of all creatures a Black Widow, know for eating its mates, was 
risking its life to save its mate. Truly the Beast Wars were strange.
    "Quickstrike is in there, and no matter what they do to me, or him, I 
will not be seperated from him. We will rescue him. You can bet on that. Now 
c'mon, idiot. " She snapped, not letting her emotions get the better of her 
usual bitter self.
